import React from "react"; import { AiOutlineCreditCard, AiOutlineMessage } from "react-icons/ai"; import { HiOutlineReceiptRefund, HiOutlineShoppingBag } from "react-icons/hi"; import { MdOutlineTrackChanges } from "react-icons/md"; import { RxPerson } from "react-icons/rx"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const ProfileSidebar = ({ setActive, active }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
setActive(1)} > Thông tin
setActive(2)} > Lịch sử mua hàng
setActive(3)} > Tình trạng đơn hàng
setActive(4)} > Lịch sử hoàn trả
setActive(5) || navigate("/inbox")} > Tin nhắn
setActive(6)} > Phương thức thanh toán
); }; export default ProfileSidebar;
